Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #frogs in a storm# gift #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Barinade#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Morpha#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #the Claim Check#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Small Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.
